title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 382.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 382.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

Predetermination grant means a grant made to a
financially eligible individual or family when all evidence secured either
prior to the granting of assistance or during the recertification process
supports a presumption of categorical eligibility, but full documentation and
proof of eligibility is lacking. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
382.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
